segments.advisor_message: Let's talk about dependents for a minute. For instance, if you have a child, their full name and date of birth are crucial for our records. If your child was born on January 15, 2015, we’d record their name and that birthday. Do you have a dependent like that?
segments.client_message: Yeah, actually, my son’s name is Ethan Smith, and he was born on 15-01-2015. I guess he’s going to be my dependent until he turns 18, right?

segments.advisor_message: Exactly! So, that would mean he’ll be your dependent until January 15, 2033. Just keep in mind any changes in his status after that date. Is there anything else regarding dependents you’d like to go over?
segments.client_message: No, I think that covers it for now. But if I add a new dependent in the future, I’ll make sure to update their details. Thanks!
